text: "Toto must never come back to Giancaldo!"

name: noname
text: He didn't say it to be mean.

name: noname
text: Who knows what was going through his head.

name: noname
text: Towards the end, he said strange things.

name: noname
text: A moment before he closed his eyes...

name: noname
text: he told your mothers he mustn't let you know.

name: noname
text: Just that I've always been afraid to come back.

name: noname
text: And now, after all these years, I thought I was stronger...

name: noname
text: that I'd forgotten a lot of things.

name: noname
text: I find I'm right back where I was...

name: noname
text: as if I'd never been away.

name: noname
text: Yet when I look around, I don't recognize anyone.

name: noname
text: Ran out on you like a bandit...

name: noname
text: You don't have to explain to me.

name: noname
text: I always thought it was good what you did. Why harp on it?

name: noname
text: You did what you wanted to do.

name: noname
text: When I call you, a different woman always answers.

name: noname
text: But I never heard in any of their voices...

name: noname
text: All the same, I'd have liked...

name: noname
text: Check the leader. Roll when you're ready.

name: noname
text: Right. And I liked your film. Terrific.
